languages.text: "Я — ткач Кровавой паутины. Мы умеем ходить неслышно и быть невидимыми. Носить чужие маски. Личины твоих подданных... не так уж и искусны. Под их светским лоском тоже прячутся лица хищников и убийц, не правда ли? Изобрести для себя подобную маску было не так сложно".

"I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."
languages.original_text: "Я — ткач Кровавой паутины. Мы умеем ходить неслышно и быть невидимыми. Носить чужие маски. Личины твоих подданных... не так уж и искусны. Под их светским лоском тоже прячутся лица хищников и убийц, не правда ли? Изобрести для себя подобную маску было не так сложно".

traits.locale_text: "I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to walk without being heard, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

"I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to walk without being heard, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

"I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

"I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

languages.text: « Je suis une tisseuse de la Toile de Sang. Nous savons mieux que personne nous fondre dans notre environnement pour devenir invisibles... et endosser les masques de ceux qui nous entourent. Les faux semblants qu'affectionnent vos sujets ne sont pas particulièrement... subtils. Prédateurs et assassins confondus savent eux aussi dissimuler leur vrai visage sous un vernis de courtoisie. M'affubler à mon tour d'un tel masque ne fut qu'une simple formalité. »
languages.original_text: "I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis une tisseuse de la Toile de Sang. Nous savons mieux que personne nous fondre dans notre environnement pour devenir invisibles... et endosser les masques de ceux qui nous entourent. Les faux semblants qu'affectionnent vos sujets ne sont pas particulièrement... subtils. Prédateurs et assassins confondus savent eux aussi dissimuler leur vrai visage sous un vernis de courtoisie. M'affubler à mon tour d'un tel masque ne fut qu'une simple formalité. »

languages.text: «Soy tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta. Sabemos andar en silencio, ser invisibles... y ponernos máscaras ajenas. Los disfraces de sus súbditos... no destacan por su sutileza. El brillo de la corte también esconde los rostros de depredadores y asesinos, ¿no? Ha sido fácil inventar un disfraz adecuado para mí».
languages.original_text: "I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

traits.locale_text: «Soy tejedora de la Red Sanguinolenta. Sabemos andar en silencio, ser invisibles... y ponernos máscaras ajenas. Los disfraces de sus súbditos... no destacan por su sutileza. El brillo de la corte también esconde los rostros de depredadores y asesinos, ¿no? Ha sido fácil inventar un disfraz adecuado para mí».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手に何を言っているのですか。察知されないように歩く方法、姿を消す方法…他人の仮面をかぶる方法を我々は知っています。あなたの臣民の装いは…それほど繊細なものでもありません。その宮廷的な輝きもまた、捕食者や殺人者の顔を隠しているのではないですか？そのような仮面を自分のために作るのは、あまり難しいことではありませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手に何を言っているのですか。察知されないように歩く方法、姿を消す方法…他人の仮面をかぶる方法を我々は知っています。あなたの臣民の装いは…それほど繊細なものでもありません。その宮廷的な輝きもまた、捕食者や殺人者の顔を隠しているのではないですか？そのような仮面を自分のために作るのは、あまり難しいことではありませんでした」

languages.text: “我是织血罗网的织网者。我们知道如何放轻脚步，如何隐匿存在……也知道如何戴上其他人的面具。你的臣民的伪装……并不算特别巧妙。尽管那些面具似乎散发着尊贵的光泽，但隐藏的却是杀手与掠食者的面容，是这样吧？对我而言，制作这样的面具不费吹灰之力。”
languages.original_text: "I am a spinner of the Bloodspun Web. We know how to tread silently, how to be invisible... how to wear other people's masks. The guises of your subjects... are not particularly subtle. Their courtly sheen, too, conceals the faces of predators and killers, does it not? I had little difficulty inventing such a mask for myself."

traits.locale_text: “我是织血罗网的织网者。我们知道如何放轻脚步，如何隐匿存在……也知道如何戴上其他人的面具。你的臣民的伪装……并不算特别巧妙。尽管那些面具似乎散发着尊贵的光泽，但隐藏的却是杀手与掠食者的面容，是这样吧？对我而言，制作这样的面具不费吹灰之力。”
